dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1783 IS: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to clarify a provision relating to the designation of a northern transportation route in Washington County, Utah.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hatch introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to clarify a provision relating to the designation of a northern transportation route in Washington County, Utah.

section.header: Washington county comprehensive travel and transportation plan
section.text: Section 1977(b)(2) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1089) is amended by striking subparagraph (A) and inserting the following:

subparagraph.text: ensure that the travel management plan—

clause.text: designates a northern transportation route in the County that follows the route depicted on the map entitled Washington Parkway; and
provides that the designation and construction of the route is not subject to additional restrictions or requirements from the United States Fish and Wildlife Service;
